summary: REQ-1 appears implemented: the specified Google Search Console verification meta tag is present in frontend/index.html داخل <head>. However, the diff also includes many additional frontend changes not requested (including modifications to frontend/src/main.tsx, which the BuildRequest explicitly lists as an immutable path), and new/changed UI/pages/hooks unrelated to adding a single meta tag.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive redesign/addition of marketing site UI (marketing page, header/footer, services section, booking form, contact section) beyond adding a single verification meta tag.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly disallow changing routing, page components, or marketing page content; the only requested change was adding one meta tag in frontend/index.html.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified admin requests page with authentication/role-based access and related React Query hooks for roles, booking submission, and admin booking requests.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1 and outside the scope (only add a meta tag).

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling and Tailwind configuration changes (new warm saffron/amber palette, custom shadows, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goals limit scope to the exact provided meta tag only (no other SEO/UI work implied).
BuildRequest constraint explicitly says not to edit immutable paths (example given includes frontend/src/main.tsx). This change is outside requested scope and violates the stated constraint.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified deployment checklist and project state metadata unrelated to adding a meta tag.
Added asset URL helper and changes related to asset handling and backend actor initialization behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for adding a single static HTML meta tag.
